thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Carolyn Gibbons

author: Carolyn Gibbons
title: Carolyn Gibbons
text: I had mistakenly preferred 2 sets of the same stationery cards!!!! I had assumed optimal would not refund my mistake but emailed them anyway and was floored when their customer service representative , Mike understood my situation as a first time customer and provided me with a full refund!! Amazing!! Optimal has made a life time customer out of me and my family:)
